definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Water vapour in gas condensate reservoir has effect on the phase state of the gas condensate system.
sentences.chinese: 凝析气藏中的水汽对凝析气体系相态变化有重大影响。

sentences.english: Research on the phase state of the gas-condensate system with water vapour;
sentences.chinese: 凝析气藏中的水汽对凝析气体系相态变化有影响。

sentences.english: Gas migration phase is an important factor influencing gas accumulation and distribution.
sentences.chinese: 天然气运移相态是影响其运聚成藏的重要因素。

sentences.english: Migration phase state is the main mark of the character of migration.
sentences.chinese: 运移相态是运移特征的主要标志。

sentences.english: When the pressure of condensate gas falls to dew point below, its phase will change.
sentences.chinese: 压力降低到露点以下时凝析气会发生相态变化。

sentences.english: The continuous oil phase is the main phase of primary migration.
sentences.chinese: 连续油相是最主要的石油初次运移相态。
